flawed_nl_solution:
If Ron is 43 now, he will be 43+5 = <<43+5=48>>48 years old in five years.
After five years, Ron will be four times as old as Maurice, meaning Maurice will be 48/4 =<<48/4=21>>21 years old then.
Currently, Maurice is 21-5 = <<21-5=16>>16 years old.
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
